topic.title: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ENTRY IDENTIFIER (CANCER FIRST SEEN)
topic.shortdesc: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ENTRY IDENTIFIER (CANCER FIRST SEEN) is the registration identifier allocated by an ORGANISATION for the CARE PROFESSIONAL who first sees the PATIENT following the initial referral which leads to the cancer diagnosis.
